record.title: TRIBUTES TO RETIRING SENATORS
record.narrative:
TRIBUTES TO RETIRING SENATORS -- (Senate - November 20, 2008)

[Page: S10776]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order from September 27 regarding tributes to retiring Senators be modified so that Senators be permitted to submit such tributes for inclusion in a Senate document until Friday, December 12, 2008.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
